definitions.title: n.pr.terr.m.
definitions.body: :De 3:3 (smooth (& fertile) land) Bashan, first mentioned as kingdom of Og, E. of Jordan, stretching from stream Jabboḳ (thus including northern Gilead) northward to Hermon, between Gennesaret (W) and mts of Hauran (E); cf. Di Nu 21:33 Wetzst:Hauran 82; later a type of fertility;—usually c. art. ´[[הַבּ]] Nu 21:33, Nu 21:33, Nu 32:33, De 1:4 + 30 t. Dt Jos; 1Ki 4:13, 1Ki 4:4; 1Ki 4:19, 2Ki 10:33, 1Ch 5:11, 1Ch 5:12, 1Ch 5:16, 1Ch 5:23, 1Ch 6:47, 1Ch 6:56, Ne 9:22, Ps 68:23, Ps 135:11, Ps 136:20, Je 22:20, Je 50:19 (‖[[הַכַּרְמֶל]]), Mic 7:14 (‖ id.), Na 1:4 (‖ id.; personif., subj. of [[אֻמְלַל]]), Is 33:9 (‖ id.; personif. subj. of [[נׁעֵר]]); [[הַר־בָּשָׁן]] (i.e. range of Hauran) Ps 68:16, Ps 68:16 (called [[הַר־אלהים]],—from a sanctuary there?—& [[הַר־גַּבְנֻנִּים]] many-peaked mt.); of stately trees ´[[אַלּוֹנֵי הַבּ]] Is 2:13 (still seen on western slope of mts. of Hauran, Wetzst:Hauran 88); ´[[אַלּוֹנֵי ב]] Zec 11:2 (fig. of prominent men); ´[[אַלּוֹנִים מִבּ]] Ez Eze 27:6; of bulls ´[[אַבִּידֵי ב]] Ps 22:13 (‖[[פָּרִים]] fig.); so ´[[בְּנֵי־ב]] De 32:l4 (+ [[כָּ רִים וְאֵילִים]] also [[עַתּוּדִים]], cf. [[בָּקָר]] & [[חאׁן]] v:a; vid. [[בֵּן]]

definitions.body: (n)); appar. more general is ´[[מְרִיאֵי ב]] Ez Eze 39:18 (ref. to [[כֻּלָּם]]…[[אֵילִים כָּ רִים וְעַתּוּדִים פָּרִים ]]); once of kine (fem., fig. of luxurious and haughty women of Samaria) Am 4:1 ´[[פָּאוֹת הַבּ]].
